int main(int argc, char** argv)
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    while (t--)
    {
        long long n, k, i;
        scanf("%lld%lld", &n, &k);
        long long ans = 1;
        //long long x = binomialCoefficient(n, k);
        for (i = n - k + 1; i <= n; i++)
        {
            ans = ((ans%MOD)*(i%MOD)) % MOD;
        }
        printf("%lld\n", ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
